resources.string: Copy your Account ID then share it with your friends so they can message you.
This Account ID is invalid. Please check and try again.
This is your Account ID. Other users can scan it to start a conversation with you.
{name} and {count} others were promoted to Admin.
Are you sure you want to promote {name} to admin? Admins cannot be removed.
Are you sure you want to promote {name} and {count} others to admin? Admins cannot be removed.
Are you sure you want to promote {name} and {other_name} to admin? Admins cannot be removed.
Failed to promote {name} and {count} others in {group_name}
There are no Admins in this Community.
Failed to remove {name} and {count} others as Admin.
Failed to remove {name} and {other_name} as Admin.
{name} and {count} others were removed as Admin.
Choose your language setting for {app_name}. {app_name} will restart when you change your language setting.
Automatically download media and files from this chat.
Would you like to automatically download all files from {conversation_name}?
Are you sure you want to clear all attachments? Messages with attachments will also be deleted.
Can\'t find an app to select media.
This file type is not supported.
Unable to send more than 32 image and video files at once.
Please send files as separate messages.
Cannot attach images and video with other file types. Try sending other files in a separate message.
You don\'t have any files in this conversation.
Unable to remove metadata from file.
You don\'t have any media in this conversation.
Attachments you save can be accessed by other apps on your device.
Too many failed authentication attempts. Please try again later.
Unblock this contact to send a message.
Are you sure you want to block {name}? Blocked users cannot send you message requests, group invites or call you.
Are you sure you want to unblock {name}?
Are you sure you want to unblock {name} and {count} others?
Are you sure you want to unblock {name} and 1 other?
You cannot start a new call. Finish your current call first.
Voice and Video Calls require notifications to be enabled in your device system settings.
You can enable the \"Voice and Video Calls\" permission in Privacy Settings.
Your IP is visible to your call partner and an Oxen Foundation server while using beta calls.
Enables voice and video calls to and from other users
You missed a call from {name} because you haven\'t enabled Voice and Video Calls in Privacy Settings.
{app_name} needs camera access to take photos and videos, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Camera\".
{app_name} needs camera access to take photos and videos, or scan QR codes.
{app_name} needs camera access to scan QR codes
This will permanently delete your messages and contacts. Would you like to clear this device only, or delete your data from the network as well?

plurals.name: clearDataErrorDescription
plurals.item: Data not deleted by %1$d Service Node. Service Node ID: %2$s.
Data not deleted by %1$d Service Nodes. Service Node IDs: %2$s.

resources.string: An unknown error occurred and your data was not deleted. Do you want to delete your data from just this device instead?
Are you sure you want to delete your data from the network? If you continue, you will not be able to restore your messages or contacts.
Are you sure you want to clear your device?
Are you sure you want to clear all messages from your conversation with {name} from your device?
Are you sure you want to clear all {community_name} messages from your device?
Are you sure you want to clear all {group_name} messages?
Are you sure you want to clear all {group_name} messages from your device?
Are you sure you want to clear all Note to Self messages from your device?
This will ban the selected user from this Community. Are you sure you want to continue?
This will ban the selected user from this Community and delete all their messages. Are you sure you want to continue?
Please check the Community URL and try again.
Oops, an error occurred. Please try again later.
Are you sure you want to join {community_name}?
You are already a member of this community.
Are you sure you want to delete {name} from your contacts? New messages from {name} will arrive as a message request.
You don\'t have any contacts yet
Choose an action to start a conversation
Thumbnail of image from quoted message
Create a conversation with a new contact
Are you sure you want to delete your conversation with {name}? New messages from {name} will start a new conversation.
Function of the enter key when typing in a conversation.
SHIFT + ENTER sends a message, ENTER starts a new line
ENTER sends a message, SHIFT + ENTER starts a new line
Delete messages from Community conversations older than 6 months, and where there are over 2,000 messages.
You don\'t have any conversations yet
Tapping the Enter Key will send message instead of starting a new line.
Enable spell check when typing messages

A database error occurred.

Export your application logs to share for troubleshooting. If this is unsuccessful, reinstall {app_name} and restore your account.

Warning: This will result in loss of all messages, attachments, and account data older than two weeks.
We\'ve noticed {app_name} is taking a long time to start.\n\nYou can continue to wait, export your device logs to share for troubleshooting, or try restarting {app_name}.

Your app database is incompatible with this version of {app_name}. Reinstall the app and restore your account to generate a new database and continue using {app_name}.\n\nWarning: This will result in the loss of all messages and attachments older than two weeks.
Some of your devices are using outdated versions. Syncing may be unreliable until they are updated.
When enabled, you\'ll only be notified for messages mentioning you.
Permanently delete the messages in this conversation?
Can\'t leave while adding or removing other members.
{name} set the disappearing message timer to {time}
Please wait while the group is created...
You don’t have permission to delete others’ messages
Are you sure you want to delete this message?
This message was deleted on this device
Are you sure you want to delete this message from this device only?
Are you sure you want to delete this message for everyone?
Are you sure you want to delete these messages?
Are you sure you want to delete these messages from this device only?
Are you sure you want to delete these messages for everyone?
This setting applies to everyone in this conversation.
This setting applies to messages you send in this conversation.
Messages delete after they have been read.
Messages delete after they have been sent.
Messages you send will no longer disappear. Are you sure you want to turn off disappearing messages?
Set your messages to disappear {time} after they have been {disappearing_messages_type}?
{name} is using an outdated client. Disappearing messages may not work as expected.
Only group admins can change this setting.
{name} has set messages to disappear {time} after they have been {disappearing_messages_type}.
You set messages to disappear {time} after they have been {disappearing_messages_type}.
{name} has turned disappearing messages off. Messages they send will no longer disappear.
You turned off disappearing messages. Messages you send will no longer disappear.
It can be your real name, an alias, or anything else you like — and you can change it at any time.
Please enter a shorter display name
We were unable to load your display name. Please enter a new display name to continue.
Are you sure you want to clear all {emoji}?
Slow down! You\'ve sent too many emoji reacts. Try again soon

plurals.name: emojiReactsCountOthers
plurals.item: And %1$d other has reacted %2$s to this message.
And %1$d others have reacted %2$s to this message.

resources.string: Please check your internet connection and try again.
{app_name} will connect to Giphy to provide search results. You will not have full metadata protection when sending GIFs.
Groups have a maximum of 100 members
Please pick at least one other group member.
Are you sure you want to delete {group_name}? This will remove all members and delete all group content.
Failed to create group. Please check your internet connection and try again.
Are you sure you want to delete this group invite?
Failed to invite {name} and {count} others to {group_name}
Users must have the latest release to receive invitations
You were invited to join the group.
You and {count} others were invited to join the group.
You and {other_name} were invited to join the group.
Are you sure you want to leave {group_name}?
Are you sure you want to leave {group_name}? This will deactivate the group for all members.
Groups have been upgraded, create a new group to upgrade. Old group functionality will be degraded from {date}.
{name} was invited to join the group. Chat history was shared.
{name} and {count} others were invited to join the group. Chat history was shared.
{name} and {other_name} were invited to join the group. Chat history was shared.
{name} and {other_name} were invited to join the group.
{name} was invited to join the group. Chat history was shared.
You and {count} others were invited to join the group. Chat history was shared.
You and {name} were invited to join the group. Chat history was shared.
You and {count} others were invited to join the group.
You and {name} were invited to join the group.
You and {count} others joined the group.
There are no other members in this group.
Please enter a shorter group name.
You have no messages from {group_name}. Send a message to start the conversation!
You are the only admin in {group_name}.\n\nGroup members and settings cannot be changed without an admin.
You and {count} others were promoted to Admin.
You and {name} were promoted to Admin.
Would you like to remove {name} from {group_name}?
Would you like to remove {name} and {other_name} from {group_name}?
Would you like to remove {name} and {count} others from {group_name}?
{name} and {count} others were removed from the group.
{name} and {other_name} were removed from the group.
You and {count} others were removed from the group.
You and {other_name} were removed from the group.
Share some details to help us resolve your issue. Export your logs, then upload the file through {app_name}\'s Help Desk.
Export your logs, then upload the file through {app_name}\'s Help Desk.
Save this file to your desktop, then share it with {app_name} developers.
Request incognito mode if available. Depending on the keyboard you are using, your keyboard may ignore this request.
You and {count} others joined the group.
Show link previews for supported URLs.
Preview not loaded for unsecure link

Display previews for URLs you send and receive. This can be useful, however {app_name} must contact linked websites to generate previews. You can always turn off link previews in {app_name}\'s settings.
You will not have full metadata protection when sending link previews.
{app_name} must contact linked websites to generate previews of links you send and receive.\n\nYou can turn them on in {app_name}\'s settings.
Require fingerprint, PIN, pattern or password to unlock {app_name}.
You must enable a passcode in your iOS Settings in order to use Screen Lock.
Quick response unavailable when {app_name} is locked!
Would you like to share group message history with {name}?
Would you like to share group message history with {name} and {count} others?
Would you like to share group message history with {name} and {other_name}?
Received a message encrypted using an old version of {app_name} that is no longer supported. Please ask the sender to update to the most recent version and resend the message.
Start a new conversation by entering your friend\'s Account ID or ONS.
Start a new conversation by entering your friend\'s Account ID, ONS or scanning their QR code.
Sending a message to this group will automatically accept the group invite.
Your message request is currently pending.
You will be able to send voice messages and attachments once the recipient has approved this message request.
You have accepted the message request from {name}.
Sending a message to this user will automatically accept their message request and reveal your Account ID.
Your message request has been accepted.
Are you sure you want to clear all message and group invites?
Allow message requests from Community conversations.
Are you sure you want to delete this message request?
You have a new message request
{name} has message requests from Community conversations turned off, so you cannot send them a message.
Hold to record a voice message
Choose a nickname for {name}. This will appear to you in your one-to-one and group conversations.
You have no messages in Note to Self.
Are you sure you want to hide Note to Self?
You\'ll be notified of new messages reliably and immediately using Google\'s notification Servers.
You\'ll be notified of new messages reliably and immediately using Apple\'s notification Servers.
You may have received messages while your {device} was restarting.
{app_name} will occasionally check for new messages in the background.
You cannot go back further. In order to cancel your account creation, {app_name} needs to quit.
You cannot go back further. In order to stop loading your account, {app_name} needs to quit.
Creating an account is instant, free, and anonymous {emoji}
You don\'t even need a phone number to sign up.
{app_name} is engineered to protect your privacy.
Hit the plus button to start a chat, create a group, or join an official community!
There are two ways {app_name} can notify you of new messages.
By using this service, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
{app_name} hides your IP by routing your messages through multiple service nodes in {app_name}\'s decentralized network. This is your current path:
We couldn\'t recognize this ONS. Please check it and try again.
We were unable to search for this ONS. Please try again later.
Change the password required to unlock {app_name}.
Your password has been changed. Please keep it safe.
Password must only contain letters, numbers and symbols
Password must be between 6 and 64 characters long
Remove the password required to unlock {app_name}.
Your password has been set. Please keep it safe.
{app_name} needs to use Apple Music to play media attachments.
Automatically check for updates on startup
The screen lock feature on {app_name} uses Face ID.
{app_name} continues running in the background when you close the window
{app_name} needs photo library access to continue. You can enable access in the iOS settings.
{app_name} needs microphone access to send audio messages, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Microphone\".
{app_name} needs storage access so you can send and save attachments. Tap Settings -> Permissions, and turn \"Files and media\" on.
{app_name} needs storage access so you can send and save attachments. Tap Settings -> Permissions, and turn \"Storage\" on.
{app_name} needs storage access to save attachments and media.
{app_name} needs storage access to save photos and videos, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Storage\".
{app_name} needs storage access to send photos and videos.
This QR code does not contain an Account ID
This QR code does not contain a Recovery Password
Friends can message you by scanning your QR code.
Show read receipts for all messages you send and receive.
Save your recovery password to make sure you don\'t lose access to your account.

Use your recovery password to load your account on new devices.\n\nYour account cannot be recovered without your recovery password. Make sure it\'s stored somewhere safe and secure — and don\'t share it with anyone.
An error occurred when trying to load your recovery password.\n\nPlease export your logs, then upload the file though Session\'s Help Desk to help resolve this issue.
Please check your recovery password and try again.
Some of the words in your Recovery Password are incorrect. Please check and try again.
The Recovery Password you entered is not long enough. Please check and try again.
To load your account, enter your recovery password.
Without your recovery password, you cannot load your account on new devices.\n\nWe strongly recommend you save your recovery password in a safe and secure place before continuing.
Are you sure you want to permanently hide your recovery password on this device? This cannot be undone.
Permanently hide your recover password on this device.
Enter your recovery password to load your account. If you haven\'t saved it, you can find it in your app settings.
This is your recovery password. If you send it to someone they\'ll have full access to your account.
Require a notification when a contact takes a screenshot of a one-to-one chat.
You must restart {app_name} to apply your new settings.
Invite your friend to chat with you on {app_name} by sharing your Account ID with them.
Share with your friends wherever you usually speak with them — then move the conversation here.
There is an issue opening the database. Please restart the app and try again.
{app_name} failed to update. Please go to {session_download_url} and install the new version manually, then contact our Help Center to let us know about this problem.
A new version of {app_name} is available, tap to update
A new version of {app_name} is available.
This will open in your browser.
Are you sure you want to open this URL in your browser?\n\n{url}
This can take a few minutes.
